original_text: So listen carefully to the commands that I am giving to you today. Love the Lord your God and serve him in everything that you think and in everything that you do.
korean_text: 내가 오늘 너희에게 명하는 내 명령을 너희가 만일 청종하고 너희의 하나님 여호와를 사랑하여 마음을 다하고 뜻을 다하여 섬기면

sentences.original_text: So listen carefully to the commands
that I am giving to you today
that you think and in everything that you do
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 생각하는 모든 것과 행하는 모든 일에
